summary: BRAKE MASTER CYLINDER FAILED, PEDAL WENT TO FLOOR WITH NO WARNING AND ALMOST CRASHED. TOPPED OFF BRAKE FLUID, AND STILL NO BRAKES.  PULLED CAP OFF VACUUM BOOSTER AND BOOSTER WAS FULL OF BRAKE FLUID.  NOW TRUCK IS SMOKING BADLY I BELIEVE FROM BRAKE FLUID BEING SUCKED INTO VACUUM HOSE.  ONLY 30,000MILES ON TRUCK 2015 F150 WITH 3.5L
